title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Formative Peer Assessment (FPA) Using Online Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can apply self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, planning) to mathematics projects
Students provide peers with specific, high-quality mathematical feedback (problem-solving methods, logical errors) through online scaffolding
Students improve mathematics project deliverables by over 80% by analyzing peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
